Text: Thanks a lot! Devil Doll = AWESOME.

Many thanks for bringing this to my attention, it sounds like exactly the sort of thing I'd enjoy!  I'm downloading now, and will be seeding for a good long time.  My thanks also to the musicians for making this planet a bit more interesting place.

Yeah, this is fucking amazing stuff.  Full orchestral arrangements segueing into hammering deathmetal guitar riffs, with an indefinable element of eerie genius.

This torrent made me a fan overnight, kind of like those vegetable pods from 'Invasion of the Body Snatchers'.  Seed and enjoy!

Devil Doll has been one of my absolute favorite musical experiences ever. Have all the CD:s. Guess they have gathered some dust during the last couple of years... Have to change that!

To anyone looking for original quality music - check this out!!!  :)
Not only bad ass music she is freakin fine as hell too.  Ive been looking all over for this!

Never mind this ant no rockabilly.
this is some lame ass depressed people crap.

Red80 - do you even read the descriptions of torrents before downloading them, or did you drop out of school before they taught words of more than one syllable?

Just because I happen to be in a good mood tonight, and I happen to enjoy her music as well, here's a link to the Rockabilly 'Devil Doll': http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4505174/Devil_Doll_-_Queen_of_Pain

That torrent has the incorrect artist information listed, but that's not surprising considering the Italian band by the same name has been in existence for 20 years now.
